CustomField.description: Indicates which approval flow is running
CustomField.formula: MIN( Approval_Flow_Fixed_Asset_Sale__c , Approval_Flow_Non_STD_Bid_Set__c , Approval_Flow_Standard_Bid_Set__c , Approval_Flow_CAPEX_T_Cs__c , Approval_Flow_Disc_No_List_Price__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates which approval flow is running
CustomField.label: Approval Flow: Effective
